original_title: The Raising of the Costa Concordia
overview: This film charts the inside story of the race to raise and re-float the stricken Costa Concordia. The colossal cruise ship crashed into rocks and capsized on the island of Giglio in Italy in a tragic disaster in which 32 people lost their lives trying to escape. This film uses stunning CGI animation and unique access footage to reveal the incredible innovations and technological breakthroughs needed to make 114,000 tons of mangled metal sail again.
tagline: The inside story of the race to raise and re-float the Costa Concordia shipwreck.
title: Raising the Costa Concordia
